amendatorysection.catchline: Qualified nonprofit organization; grant; requirements; repayment, when.
amendatorysection.para: (1) Each qualified nonprofit organization that receives a grant under the Shovel-Ready Capital Recovery and Investment Act shall:

(a) Secure all of the private funds described in subdivision (1)(d) of section 81-12,222 through a written pledge or payment by December 31, 2021, and shall begin or resume construction on the organization's capital project by June 30, 2022; and
(b) Abide by the federal laws commonly known as the Davis-Bacon and Related Acts.
(2) Any qualified nonprofit organization that fails to meet the requirements of subsection (1) of this section shall repay any grant funds received under the act.
